work.position: Geodesic Research - AI Safety Research Intern
highlights: Researching Chain of Thought Obfuscation Generalisation in Large Language Models.
Developed experimental pipelines for reinforcement learning on Qwen-4B, including dataset construction and augmentation.

work.position: National University of Singapore - Machine Learning Research Intern
highlights: Investigated ML-augmented subgrid-scale modelling to accelerate CFD simulations, supervised by Dr Qianxiao Li.
Implemented and benchmarked Transformer and UNet architectures for turbulence prediction.
Analysed the effect of different filtering methods on a priori and a posteriori model error under different boundary conditions.
Developed internal tools to optimise the stress analysis pipeline.
Conducted FEA using Hypermesh on components including the rocker, drybrake, and nose cone; supported FIA certification and crash test analysis.
Analysed live telemetry and cable data using ATLAS during practice and qualifying sessions in the Operations Room.

awards.title: Townsend Scholarship and Wright Prize
